programme.desc: Caithfidh Cory cinneadh deacair a dhéanamh faoin té a thabharfaidh sé leis chuig ceolchoirm. (Cory has to make a difficult decision when he wins two tickets to a concert.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Bíonn brionglóid ag Buster go mbíonn sé ag spraoi le siorc. (Buster dreams he is a fish in the sea, and meets a shark with a mouthful of sharp teeth.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Caitheann Buster agus Digley an lá ar an trá ag déanamh caisleán gainimh. (Buster visits the beach and builds a sandcastle.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Bíonn cluiche sacair ag Buster agus na feithiclí eile. (Buster and the other vehicles have a soccer game.)

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: Ní foláir do Gecko a scíth a ligean ó tharla gur ghortaigh sé a chos. (Gecko must rest after hurting his leg.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Tá bus nua ag Cnag agus tá sí ag tabhairt bealach timpeall na foraoise do gach uile dhuine. (Crunch is driving everyone around the forest in a bus.)

programme.title: Igam Ogam
programme.desc: Tá Igam Ogam ag iarraidh cluiche tomhas a imirt. (Igam Ogam asks everyone to play a guessing game.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Tá Romeo ag iarraidh go dtabharfaidh na PJeanna cúnamh dó ach níl muinín ar bith acu as. (Romeo needs the PJs' help but they don't trust him.)

programme.title: Wussywat
programme.desc: Tagann Wussywat ar bhosca mór millteach sa ghairdín & tá sí ag iarraidh é a oscailt ach cinneann sé uirthi. (Wussywat finds a music box in the garden & wants to open it.)

programme.title: Kid E Cats
programme.desc: Téann Daidí agus na piscíní ar strae i lúbra. (Daddy and the kittens get lost in a labyrinth.)

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Téann ár gcairde ag campáil ach le titim na hoíche ceapann siad go bhfuil taibhse ina measc. (Our friends go camping but by nightfall they think there is a ghost among them.)

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Buaileann cara Ginger, an Brocailísár óg, cic ar an liathróid i dtreo na Fatadóin. (Ginger's baby Broccolisaurus friend kicks their ball into Potatodon territory.)

programme.title: Momonsters
programme.desc: Téann na Momonsters ar eachtra trí fhásach agus trí dhufair chontúirteach. (The Momonsters go on an adventure through a hot desert and a dangerous jungle.)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Tá Dot ag iarraidh madra dá madra féin! (Dot wants her dog to have a dog.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Tá an diabhal ar Charlie a bheith ag baint geit as Lola ach cinneann sé ar Lola Charlie a scanrú. (Charlie is good at making Lola jump.)

programme.title: Baile Beag Draíochtúil Pinocchio
programme.desc: Is beag nach ndéantar aonbheannach de Bhéibhinn nuair a thugtar adhaircín di mar bhronntanas! (After receiving a horn as a present, Béibhinn is nearly transformed into a unicorn!)

programme.title: Banainmhithe
programme.desc: Tá Alfie idir dhá chomhairle. Ar cheart dó a sheanghiotár a thabhairt do Kiki nó é a choinneáil dó féin? (Alfie is conflicted. Should he give his old guitar to Kiki or keep it?)

programme.title: Jamie's Got Tentacles
programme.desc: Déanann Erwin cáca. (Erwin makes a cake.)

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Tá sé i gceist ag Dónall fanacht ciúin le go bhfaighidh sé píotsa, ach níl sé chomh éasca is a shíl sé. (Dónall plans to stay extremely quiet so that he will receive a pizza.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi bheannú do dhuine a bheidh againn inniu. (A fun song about saying Hello!)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Rachaidh Dó ar thóir bróga damhsa draíochta inniu. (Two goes in search of magic dancing shoes today.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Ní mó ná sásta a bhíonn Dearg nuair a bhíonn dath liath ar an spéir. (Red gets upset when the day suddenly turns grey.)

programme.title: Pramsáil
programme.desc: Ní fonn ar bith ar Roy dul chuig an siopa, tá sé an-leadránach! (Roy doesn't want to go to the shop, it's so boring!)

programme.title: Lá Le Mamó nó Daideo
programme.desc: Tá Martha leis an lá a chaitheamh in éineacht lena Mamó Maggie. (Martha is going to spend the day with her Mamó Maggie.)

programme.title: Ó a Sheáin
programme.desc: Balún bán, balún buí, banana, buicéad agus bosca bruscair a bheidh ag déanamh imní do Sheán inniu. (Seán goes to the shop today and has an adventure.)

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: Ní foláir do Gecko a scíth a ligean ó tharla gur ghortaigh sé a chos. (Gecko must rest after hurting his leg.)

programme.title: Béiríní is a Leabhair
programme.desc: Tá cúnamh ag teastáil ó bhéabhar chun damba a thógáil. (When a beaver needs help building a dam, the Bears learn about sharing and helping someone in need.)

programme.title: Béiríní is a Leabhair
programme.desc: Faigheann Art amach nach raibh i nGruagach Gránna na gCrann ach dhá iora rua ag súgradh. (Art discovers that LoggieLooBoo is just two squirrels playing in a hollow log.)

programme.title: Pikwik Pack
programme.desc: Tá Suki ag súil go mór a bád a sheoladh sa drochaimsir chun pacáiste a sheachadadh. (Suki is excited to take her boat out in some rough weather for a delivery.)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Sonaí an saol ina bharista nuair a bheidh sé mór le cúnamh ó Shióg na bPost. (Sonaí imagines his life as a barista when he grows up, with the help of the Job Fairy.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Is ag foghlaim faoi bhláthanna a bheidh Daisy agus Ollie inniu. (Daisy and Ollie discover why flowers are so special.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Caitín ag snámh, coileán ceanúil agus mús ag lí a bheidh againn inniu. (Today we'll see kitten swimmers, puppy smoochers and truck lickers.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is é Dermot Somers, an siúlaí agus dreapadóir, a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín ar an gclár seo. (Dermot Somers joins Máirtín Tom Sheáinín on the programme.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Iarrann an cóitseálaí Silva ar Kevin a bheith ar an bhfoireann iomrascála. (Kevin is asked by coach Silva to join the wrestling team.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Scoth an cheoil as The Local i nDún Garbháin á chur i láthair ag Fionn Mac Giolla Chuda. (Traditional Irish music from The Local in Dungarvan, presented by Fionn Mac Giolla Chuda.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Tá Dorothy craiceáilte i ndiaidh duine d'fhoireann "Beatlemania". (Dorothy goes bananas over a "Beatlemania" cast member.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Fiosraíonn Jessica dúnmharú léirmheastóra drámaí. (Jessica investigates the murder of a drama critic who reviewed a play based on one of her novels.)

programme.title: Comhluadar Ceoil
programme.desc: The Hothouse Flowers a bheidh i mbun cainte le Dáithí sa chlár seo. (Dáithí Ó Sé meets The Hothouse Flowers.)

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Beidh Paul Murton ag tabhairt cuairt ar na hoileáin in Linne Foirthe. (Paul Murton explores the islands scattered in the Firth of Forth.)

programme.title: Ceol Tíre Ó Inis Rogha agus Togha
programme.desc: Beidh ceol ó The Indians, Hugo Duncan, Tony Stevens agus Charlie McGettigan ar an gclár. (The best of Ceol Tíre ó Inis with music from The Indians, Hugo Duncan and many more.)

programme.title: Escape from the City
programme.desc: Tá Bridget ag iarraidh teach a cheannach in Hunter Valley seachas in Sydney. (Single mum Bridget chases her dream of becoming a home owner in NSW's Hunter Valley.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Rásaí Beo
programme.desc: Craoladh beo ar rásaíocht capall ó Chorcaigh. Leanfar leis an gclár i ndiaidh Nuacht TG4. (Live coverage of horse racing from Cork. Coverage will continue after Nuacht TG4.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Nuacht TG4
programme.desc: Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)

programme.title: Hup!
programme.desc: Sraith ceoil thraidisiúnta. I Mainistir na Féile i Luimneach a bheimid an tseachtain seo. (We visit Abbeyfeale, Co. Limerick where Fleadh by the Feale is in full swing.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: An Western: Rawhide
programme.desc: Tá oibrí cóiste & bean sáinnithe ag gadaithe a bhfuil rún acu lastas óir a ghoid. (A stagecoach employee & a woman traveller find themselves at the mercy of outlaws.)

programme.title: Agnetha - Abba & After
programme.desc: Clár faisnéise faoin mbanna ceoil cáiliúil ABBA. (This documentary includes interviews with the members of ABBA and is especially focused on Agnetha Faltskog.)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Tagann Lorraine ar Dot sa deireadh le cabhair ó dhaoine ar a haithne. (Lorraine uses her powerful political and financial connections to pin down Dot.)

programme.title: Croíthe Radacacha
programme.desc: Grá faoi cheilt le linn na Réabhlóide in Éirinn is ábhar don chlár seo. (A documentary about 'the love that dares not speak its name' at the very heart of the Irish Revolution.)
